name: Calming Kendall Sq Studio w/ Gym, nr MIT
description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this cheery Kendall Square furnished studio apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and exquisite living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Cambridge has to offer! (ID #BOS42)

The space
Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this studio apartment. Ideally located in Cambridge, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio include an on-site:

- BBQ Area
- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevat
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is situated on Kendall Square at the intersection of Main Street and Broadway. The area hosts MIT and a variety of co-working spaces and incubators, ideal for bright young minds. It is home to a cutting-edge tech community and has thus become one of the world's most important tech and biotech centers. Farm-to-table restaurants and third-wave coffee joints have also found their places around this startup culture. The Cambridge neighborhood, which is a top destination for shopping, is centered around Kendall Square. The Kendall transit stop is only a 4-minute walk away via Main Street.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Pretty private garden-level condo+parking near MIT
description:
Walking distance of MIT/Central/Tech Square and a number of nice cafes and bars in the heart of Cambridge.
+ Newly finished modern apartment;
+ Self-checkin with a smartlock;
+ Private apartment exclusively yours;
+ Private off-street entrance;
+ On-street parking permit included;
+ Work- and laptop-friendly spaces;
+ Sparkling clean with new appliances and fixtures.

The space
Pretty and newly finished guest suite with complete privacy including a private off-street entrance.

Smart, modern, and work-friendly:
+ Self-checkin with smartlocks and video doorbell for security;
+ WiFi, Ethernet, wireless Qi charging, laptop-friendly ergonomic spaces;
+ Smart speaker, up to 100-inch projector TV in living room.

Private, spacious, new:
+ Entire one-bedroom, one-bath apartment exclusively yours;
+ Private off-street entrance separate from rest of building;
+ Comfortably spacious, at l
neighborhood_overview:
Walk friendly: Walking distance (10-20 mins) to MIT, Kendall square, and east and mid Cambridge. A longer walk (~1.5 mi) or short Uber/Lyft ride to Harvard.

Runner friendly: Warm up with a walk/run ~1 mile to get to the Charles river, and then run a loop taking one bridge across the river to Boston and another back to create a 3 mile or 4 mile loop (depending on the bridge), and then cool down another ~1 mile to get back home. Except the bridges, Cambridge/Boston is really flat, perfect for easy jogs.

Groceries: Multiple Whole Foods locations within ~0.6 to ~0.8 miles; Star Market ~0.6 miles away; Market Basket ~0.9 miles away.
host_about: Scientist, traveler, coffee lover, fitness freak, politics junkie with an irrational faith in humanity.

name: Stunning urban hideaway nearby Harvard Square
description:
Charming apartment in a 19th century Victorian house conserves its period architectural details in recently renovated comfort. Light streams into this en-suite guest residence through gracious windows. Beautiful cabinetry and bookcases offer some evening reading. Enjoy the marble bathroom and hardware floors and well-appointed kitchenette. A stone's throw from Porter Square, where bars, cafes, boutiques, and transportation options abound. Minutes to Harvard, MIT and Boston.

The space
Your own separate space:
This apartment is a separate space in our house, and has acoustic insulation to ensure as much privacy as possible. Concealed by a curtain, there is a sealed door in the bathroom, which must remain closed. The apartment has its own entry from the front porch so you may come and go as you please. There is a washer and dryer onsite for your convenience.

Comfort:
We have a Nest thermostat that controls the temperature. The timing is set f
neighborhood_overview:
Historic, posh Avon Hill neighborhood is great for walking. This part of Cambridge in general has an abundance of old Victorian homes over several square miles. The Cooper-Frost-Austin house (1681), oldest in Cambridge, is just down the street. Raymond Park and playground is nearby as well. The Harvard campus is a short distance away, and in addition to the famous yard proposes the Natural History Museum and its renowned Art Museum. Historic Cambridge Common, where General Washington's troops assembled, is nearby as well. The Porter Square subway stop is a 3-minute walk, and one stop away from Davis square or Harvard Square.

For shopping an errands, we recommend:

Porter Square Post Office
Porter Square Book store
Caffe Nero
Cafe Bourbon
The Abbey (bistro)
Bagelsaurus bakery
The Toad (cozy live music bar)
Christopher's (bistro and sports bar)
Colette Wine Bar and Restaurant
Yume Wo Katare ramen bar
Lunder Arts Cen
host_about: Marie and Andrew have been living in Cambridge for a dozen years. Marie grew up in the romantic city of Paris, and is now a filmmaker and script writer. She also loves to cook and read. Andrew hails from the south, moved to Paris to study architecture, and now runs a design and visualization practice in Cambridge. Andrew and Marie love to travel and strike up unexpected friendships.

description:
The perfect place for your stay in Cambridge! This renovated 1 bedroom apartment is located on a residential street near Porter Square, red line T station, shops, restaurants, and more. It is one subway stop, or a pleasant 20 minute walk, away from Harvard Square to the South, or to lively Davis Square to the North. You can also be downtown Boston within 20 minutes by car or subway from Porter Square. Street parking permit provided for one car.

The space
This basement apartment features one bedroom with a queen size bed and large closet, living room with internet-connected TV & cable, and kitchen. The kitchen includes a fridge, microwave, induction plate, counter top oven, toaster, coffee maker (we provide pods), and kitchenware. There are in-unit washer and dryer. Free and ample street parking (we provide a guest parking permit).

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
This neighborhood houses one of the best-known high-tech and innovation hubs of the United States and arguably has the highest concentration of PhD's in the world.

However, this neighborhood is probably the most "below the radar" for tourists, but what it lacks in glamour it more than makes up for it in total, earnest hidden-gem-ness. Cruise down its main aorta, Cambridge Street, for access to some of the best fish markets, Portuguese bakeries, and well-loved bars in town. Mall rats can get their fill between the Cambridgeside Galleria and the Twin City Plaza shopping center, but one would be remiss to pass up stylish treasures at the Cambridge Antique Market. The residential makeup is richly diverse, anchored with strong Irish and Portuguese communities. Local pride runs thick.

name: NEW Sunny, Large 1Bed facing Harvard Law School!!
description:
**Please send Inquiry, not Request!

Chic, fully renovated 1bedroom 10 meters from Harvard Law School! High ceilings, tons of light, original art & high end furniture. Authentic Harvard experience.

-7 minute walk to Harvard Square train
-24 hr keyless entry
-Quiet 1st floor apt
-Safe Harvard Square neighborhood
-Perfect for exploring Harvard, MIT, Cambridge, Boston
-Great food, history & culture within 1 min walk
-Ideal for visiting schools, business or vacation
-Helpful Superhost :)

The space
This gorgeous apartment in a historical building is SO close to Harvard Law School, it appears to be on campus!

This spacious, quiet home is the perfect location to walk everywhere at Harvard.

Guest access
The entire newly renovated apartment!

The bedroom is located in the back of the apartment—private and quiet. The bedroom has a large closet, high-end mattress, and lu
neighborhood_overview:
This is located at Harvard Square, a fantastic historic area. There are dozens of great restaurants, shops, and history about 30 seconds from the door!

It's a cultural hub--you'll find tons of diverse food (Thai, Indian, Italian, Asian, Gastro, New American, Venezuelan!) and activities down the street.

The Museum of Natural History is a 5 minute walk, and the renowned Harvard Art Museums are a 10 minute walk. Harvard Law School is literally 10 meters from the apartment.

The Red Line train is right in the center of Harvard Square. It's easy and inexpensive to take the train to any location in Boston or Cambridge.
host_about:
Gleeful epicurean and traveler, always planning or returning from a trip.

Polyglot—I studied Swahili, Portuguese, Spanish, French, and Latin. I explore street markets until they close or kick me out. Can't live without passport, antique books, botany, kids & dogs, dinner club, gelato...

I mentor startups at Harvard and work in finance. 

Hosting is a blast; I give guests privacy, but I'm always available to help or make recommendations. I treat guests like fam and surprise them with treats. 

Everyone is welcome!

description:
On the lower level of a beautiful Victorian home, this one-bedroom apartment is completely new construction with loads of amenities and a fun, modern vibe. Excellent location in trendy, quaint East Cambridge. Get anywhere fast! Short walks to MIT/Kendall Square/Biotech, the Museum of Science, the Charles River, and the red and green subway lines, which allow quick access to Harvard, MGH, and historic Boston. The neighborhood is full of life with restaurants and cafes, yet our street is serene.

The space
You'll find everything you need to enjoy your stay: modern kitchen & bathroom, wifi, washer/dryer, central heat & a/c, Roku/youtube TV, hardwood floors, comfy bed, and your own entrance.

The floor plan is open, so the bedroom is separate but without its own door. Great for families with a child sleeping on the sofa bed in the living room.

The electricity is 100% solar-powered.

There are five steps down from the sidewalk to the
neighborhood_overview: East Cambridge is charming and transforming, especially in and around Kendall Square. Our home is nestled into a few streets of older houses. While close to everything, including a bounty of restaurants and cafes within a 3-15 minute walk, side streets like ours stay nice and quiet.

name: Tangerine Dream - Pvt Entry, MIT-Harvard-Downtown
description:
Our newly renovated private guest room with private entry is ready for you in our single family home. With a keypad entry, you'll appreciate coming home on your own terms. We are a short walk from Kendall Square, MIT, and a quick T ride to downtown Boston and Harvard. The listing is for one room with one queen bed.

We are fully licensed with the City and insured.

NOTE: We are undergoing a major renovation and the spaces will look even better when done!

The space
Our guest room, Tangerine Dream, is located on the first floor just off the kitchen. Tangerine Dream is cozy and features new floors, fresh paint, newly installed AC/heating system. and new furniture. A Room & Board convertible sofa opens to a comfortable yet firm queen bed; a mattress topper can be used to soften the mattress if you'd like. The room includes a 4k TV.

Tangerine Dream is adjacent the brand new designer kitchen as is the brand new bathroom. During your stay
neighborhood_overview:
We're in an amazing location and walking distance to many cafes, restaurants, breweries, a Formaggio cheese shop, and an indie theater (Kendall Square Cinema). One of Boston's best restaurants is right around the corner (Cafe du Pays) as is one of Boston's must try watering holes: Lamplighter Brewery, not to mention Lord Hobo and Mead Hall. Vincent’s is also nearby with tasty breakfast tacos. Flour Bakery + Cafe, one of the best spots in Boston, is a short 10 - 15 min walk.

MIT and Kendall Square are less than 10 minutes by foot. Have an interview? This is the place to stay. We're just a few steps from Pfizer, Akamai, Novartis, Fa*ebook, G**gle, Microsoft, Apple, Moderna, Broad Institute, Draper, Biogen, Sanofi, Takeda, CIC, MIT-Sloan, and so many more.

Harvard and downtown Boston are just a short two stops away on the T (Boston's subway), as are all of the tourist attractions.
host_about:
I'm an Architect and designer in Boston. Former San Franciscan and Seattelite.
My partner Luis is a planner and developer. He is a native East Coaster.

We love to travel and are in California frequently. We love to travel and look forward to meeting folks from all over the world.

name: 2BR in Kendall Sq w/ Gym, Doorman nr MIT & MGH
description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this charming Kendall Square furnished two-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and spacious living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Cambridge has to offer! (ID #BOS55)

The space
Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this two-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in Cambridge, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom include an on-site:

- BBQ Area
- Dryer in building
- Elevator
- Gym
- Washing machi
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is situated on Kendall Square at the intersection of Main Street and Broadway. The area hosts MIT and a variety of co-working spaces and incubators, ideal for bright young minds. It is home to a cutting-edge tech community and has thus become one of the world's most important tech and biotech centers. Farm-to-table restaurants and third-wave coffee joints have also found their places around this startup culture. The Cambridge neighborhood, which is a top destination for shopping, is centered around Kendall Square. The Kendall transit stop is only a 4-minute walk away via Main Street.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: (1) North Cambridge Private Bedroom Full Bed
description:
This bedroom (1 full bed) features beautiful natural light, a lounging chair, and a walk-in closet. We are located in the residential neighborhood of North Cambridge, an 8 minute walk from the Davis Square Red Line train station, and a 3 minute walk to buses that will take you to Harvard & Central Sq. There are various restaurants and cafes within walking distance, and we will be happy to give you more suggestions if you are looking for things to do in the area. Looking forward to hosting you!

The space
This is our second listing. We also host Airbnb guests in an adjacent bedroom for two.

Guest access
Guests will have access to their private bedroom and the shared bathroom. You are welcome to leave your leftover takeout food in our refrigerator, and warm your food in the microwave. However, we ask that guests do not use the kitchen for cooking. We are a family of 3 working adults who consistently use the space for our personal meals.
neighborhood_overview: This is a pleasant residential neighborhood, an easy 8 minute walk to bustling Davis Square (Tufts University), where you can take the Red Line to Harvard Square, MIT, and into Boston. There are also plenty of restaurants and cafes within walking distance, as well as the Minuteman Bike Path and Fresh Pond Reservation if you feel like enjoying an outdoor stroll.
host_about: Longtime resident of Cambridge, wife and mother, activist, and teacher of adults. Enjoy getting to know different people from around the world, as well as exploring new places and learning their history.

name: Kendall Sq Studio w/ Gym, W/D by MIT, MGH & River
description:
Discover the best of Cambridge, with this studio Kendall Square apartment with high floor views over the city. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this beautifully Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, lovely living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #BOS67)

The space
As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this studio property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the Cambridge vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio include an on-site:

- BBQ Area
- Doorman
- Dryer<
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is situated on Kendall Square at the intersection of Main Street and Broadway. The area hosts MIT and a variety of co-working spaces and incubators, ideal for bright young minds. It is home to a cutting-edge tech community and has thus become one of the world's most important tech and biotech centers. Farm-to-table restaurants and third-wave coffee joints have also found their places around this startup culture. The Cambridge neighborhood, which is a top destination for shopping, is centered around Kendall Square. The Kendall transit stop is only a 4-minute walk away via Main Street.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Porter Square, Cambridge near the intersection of Somerville and Massachusetts Avenue. The area is always buzzing with activity and offers a wide range of goods and services such as coffee shops, supermarkets and gyms. There are more unique options as well though like a Japantown mall and a live music venue. Widely known for having a diverse restaurant scene, people flock from all over to have a meal here. Full of students and young professionals, Porter Square is easily reached via the MBTA Red Line and the Commuter Rail. Originally named for Porter’s Hotel which use to be the center of the square, Porter Square has evolved into an area offering something for everyone.

*30+ day* Luxury two bedroom at a prime location in Cambridge, close to Harvard, MIT, Kendall Square and downtown Boston. The bus is one-minute away and Kendall Square is within walking distance. Short walk to the T stations. Near shops, grocery stores, restaurants and tourist scenes. 2 queen beds and 1 queen air mattress. High-quality mattresses, beddings, linens. High-end furnishings in a designer space. Nespresso. Modern kitchen, wifi, AC in every room. In-unit laundry. Certified lead free.

The space
Luxury two bedroom at a prime location in Cambridge, close to Harvard, MIT, Kendall Square and downtown Boston. The bus is one-minute away and Kendall Square is within walking distance. Short walk to the T stations. Near shops, grocery stores, restaurants and tourist scenes. 2 queen beds and 1 queen air mattress. High-quality mattresses, beddings, linens. High-end furnishings in a designer space. Nespresso. Modern kitchen, wifi, AC in every room. In-unit laundry a
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is located on a relatively quiet street, while providing the convenience of being close to MIT, Harvard, Kendall Square, Central Square, and downtown Boston. There are many shops, bars and restaurants within walking distance, about 1-13 minute walk depending on where you want to go.

More information
You will be able to walk to grocery stores and pharmacy near the subway station in 5-15 minutes, so you may enjoy the comfort of a quiet neighborhood and the convenience of shops nearby. Depending on what you're hoping to do while in town, we are happy to make suggestions and help you have the best time possible when you visit.

name: Modern studio by MIT Kendall Harvard  By Pike Hubs
description:
Our renovated luxury house is nestled on a safe tree-lined, in the PERFECT Cambridge location. Private 650 sq/ft studio, with all top of the line bed sheets (Ralph Lauren towels as an example), fast streaming tech TV 55" with a 1,000Mb internet, kitchen stocked with everything you may need. Sleeps 3. Street Parking AVAILABLE with our visitor parking PERMIT. Short walk to restaurants, Harvard 6 min, MIT 5 min, Central Sq 5 min. 30 days stays or longer as per the City of Cambridge.

The space
Welcome to one of the top rated and most desired Cambridge AirBNB properties. We just did a complete renovation of this house. This means everything from the wiring and plumbing to the appliances are brand new. We built it for a luxury experience. Hard wood, new appliances, led lighting all await your perfect stay. The house has electronic locks so you don't have to worry about getting locked out and can check in whenever is best for you. Coffee, shampoo and conditioner, body l
neighborhood_overview:
The Apartment is garden level. (Which means between basement and 1st level)

- Check in is after 4:00pm. You may check in any time after 4:00pm as the doors have electronic key pads.
- Check out is before 10:00am
- Early check-in or late check out is not possible. Unless previously agreed in writing.
- Everything is automated so you will let yourself in and check yourself out.

Parking:
There is a visitor parking permit in your unit that you can use. Please check out the City of Cambridge website for more parking details.

We have a Alexa security camera outside the house in front and back. We do not store footage after 10 days. There are NO security cameras inside.
host_about: I am a father,  philanthropist,  traveler, animal lover, mountain biker,  who loves to entertain and host! I have been to over 30 countries from Europe to South America, love good food and making new friends. Although I have a very professional approach to Airbnb I am more focused in making friends and creating great connections. I speak English, Portuguese and Spanish fluently so feel free to write or speak those languages with me. Welcome to our space and enjoy Boston!

name: Studio 3-minute walk to subway
description:
*30+ day rental* Studio suite 3-minute walk to Red Line subway station and walking distance to Harvard Square. Enjoy the direct short train ride to Kendall Square, MIT, downtown Boston and other major destinations. Direct bus ride to Tufts. Steps to grocery stores, restaurants, theatre and great night scenes in Davis Square. Fresh linens and towels. 1 queen bed. 1 sofa bed. Updated bathroom. Coffee machine, WiFi. Shared deck.

The space
***In response to COVID, we sanitize and professionally clean the entire apartment. Our cleaning staff wear masks and gloves. We also provide keypad entry so there is no need to meet in person to exchange keys.***

This gorgeous studio suite features a TV, a queen bed, sofa bed, a desk, a fridge, a microwave, coffee maker, an induction stove, utensils, pots, plates, pots and pans. The space is thoroughly cleaned before each check-in and supplied with fresh beddings and linens. Unit comes with free wifi, Netflix access.
neighborhood_overview: We are a 3-minute walk to grocery stores, subway, hardware store, bookstore and many restaurants. Our neighborhood is located on a quiet street, while providing the convenience of being literally steps to the Red Line Porter Square train station. We are about 15-minute walk to Harvard (or 1 stop after walking directly to the subway station across the street). If you take the subway or bus, you can get to Harvard in less than 10 minutes. Red Line also takes you directly to downtown Boston.
host_about: Hello I’m Tina! I’m a host in Boston. I’m an avid traveler and I enjoy making friends with people from all over the world. I look forward to hosting you! :)

name: Kendall Sq Studio w/ Gym, W/D nr MIT & River
description:
Discover the best of Cambridge, with this studio Kendall Square apartment with views over the city. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this lavishly Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, cozy living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #BOS72)

The space
As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this studio property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the Cambridge vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio include an on-site:

- BBQ Area
- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevat
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is situated on Kendall Square at the intersection of Main Street and Broadway. The area hosts MIT and a variety of co-working spaces and incubators, ideal for bright young minds. It is home to a cutting-edge tech community and has thus become one of the world's most important tech and biotech centers. Farm-to-table restaurants and third-wave coffee joints have also found their places around this startup culture. The Cambridge neighborhood, which is a top destination for shopping, is centered around Kendall Square. The Kendall transit stop is only a 4-minute walk away via Main Street.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Beautiful, recently built, modern house with 3200 square feet of living space situated between Harvard Square and Central Square - ideal space for a family who needs to be in Cambridge during quarantine, but needs extra space. Garden and yard with patio, grill and table for 8. Driveway for 2 cars and includes a basketball hoop. Bikes and scooters available. Large playroom. This location can't be beat! The subway is a 7 minute walk. Please note ALL dates in May are available now. Pls inquire

The space
Upgrade your quarantine space! You will not find a better location in Cambridge [which is why we live here!]. Situated on a very quiet, residential street, this large house is still within a few minutes' walk to restaurants, Starbucks, shops, bars and the subway. It's incredibly close to Boston. The house itself is equipped with everything you could possibly need. There are 5 bedrooms with very comfortable mattresses, and 5 bathrooms: everything in this hou
neighborhood_overview: There is a lot to do in Cambridge/Boston/Massachusetts in the summer!  You don't even need a car to see the sites in either city.
host_about: My family and I are avid travel enthusiasts and have often rented other people's homes, which has made it so much more enjoyable to see the area as a family. When you have kids or are traveling with parents, sometimes it's easier to be in a house than a hotel, and we hope our home will enable you to do the same, all while enjoying the best this spectacular city and region has to offer.

name: Renovated Furnished Apartment in Cambridge Home
description:
Near Harvard and MIT, this luxurious apartment is in an ideal location. Its spacious and open floor plan is perfect for families, large groups or business travel. Modern and recently renovated, this unit features hardwood floors, flat screen televisions, an enclosed porch and stainless steel appliances in its fully-equipped kitchen. Accommodates up to 10 guests, everyone will find a cozy place to rest in this large 4/5 bedroom unit. Desks and internet are also provided, parking available.

The space

neighborhood_overview:

Depending on what you're hoping to do while in town, we are happy to make suggestions and help you have the best time possible when you visit.
host_about:

In our free time, we like to go out with friends, travel, as well as enjoy all the fun activities that Boston has to offer. Our style of hosting is flexible because everyone's needs are different. We want to make your stay enjoyable and help you meet your goal of staying here. We look forward to hosting you! :)

name: Harvard Studio-Parking-Laundry-Kitchen-Queen Bed
description:
Simple studio apartment w/ kitchen, in-unit laundry, direct access parking, full bathroom, queen bed, couch, tv w/ fire stick, high speed internet, A/C, big windows facing back yard, and more. The space is ideal for 1-2 people but we can offer a blow up mattress for a child upon request.

Our home is on a quiet side street but only one block from Massachusetts Ave with many restaurants and shops just around the corner. 10-15 minute walk to both Harvard and Porter Squares and Red line T stops.

The space
The apartment is on the 1st floor of a 2 family townhouse. The 2 units share a front door that leads to an entryway with a door to the left for Unit 1 (AIRBNB) and a door to the right for Unit 2, where our family lives. Unit 1 is a clean space with big bright windows and everything you would need for a comfortable short or long term stay.

We are a registered short term rental (STR) with the city of Cambridge STR-52032.

Other t
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is great!  Our home is on a quiet side street but steps from all you could need.  Around the corner is a starbucks, local coffee shops, high end restaurants, casual restaurants, bars, live music, ice cream, pizza, pharmacy, parks, etc.  All literally within a 3-5 minute walk.  Walking 10-15 minutes is harvard square in one direction and porter square in the other.  We are across the street from Harvard Law School and Lesley University and a 10 minute walk to Harvard Yard.  The red line Train runs right through Harvard and Porter which will bring you to downtown Boston in less than 30 minutes.
host_about:
My husband and I are working professionals with two children and have lived in the Boston/Cambridge area for over 10 years.  We love to visit local parks, dine out, and be tourists in our own city, especially when friends/family come to visit.  There is so much to do and see, we'd be happy to provide recommendations!

We also love to travel as a family.  When we look for an airbnb, our focus is on clean, convenient, and affordable.  That's what we aim to provide for our guests, a place where you feel clean and comfortable and have all the conveniences we can provide.  At our home you will have your own laundry, direct access parking spot, high speed internet, a big TV with smart features, air conditioning, and a compact but fully functional kitchen.  If you travel anything like us, we think you'll be very happy and we look forward to being your host!

You’ll love this stylish Harvard Square furnished two-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and pretty living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Cambridge has to offer! (ID #BOS90)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your sophisticated living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Harvard Square apartment has to offer. This apartment also offers in-floor laundry.

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located at Harvard Square, a triangular plaza near the center of Cambridge, Massachusetts. 'The Square' (as it is sometimes referred to locally) is both a commercial and residential center. Bookstores, theatres and music venues line the streets and enhance the energetic atmosphere. The neighborhood's central location, close proximity to university campuses and many public transportation options make it a bustling hub for people of all ages. During the day, take a stroll and discover the area's tranquil scenery. At night, there are countless bar and entertainment options. On the T, Downtown is a 15 minute ride while Logan International Airport is 30 minutes away.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

This is a spacious, light-filled one-bedroom apartment, about 650 square feet. The kitchen is large, and stocked with silverware, plates, bowls, glasses, pots and pans. It has a gas range, and solid granite countertops.

The apartment accommodates four adults plus one infant. (Queen bed, sofabed, pack-n-play.) (Note: a standard queen mattress is 60" x 80", while this sofabed's mattress is 60" x 72".)

description:
Experience all the area has to offer in this updated home in the Harvard Square neighborhood. The spacious apt. has 3/4 bedrooms and 9' ceilings. Master bed has a walk-in closet. 4th room can either be a bedroom with queen bed or table seating four. Sun filled living area with chic seating. The 2020 renovated kitchen features a subzero fridge. Steps to coffee shops and blocks to Cambridge's best restaurants. Nearby off-street parking $250/mo. Suitable only for smaller dogs.

The space
This sun-drenched apartment offers a tranquil residential vibe alongside quick, easy access to Harvard Square and the Boston area. Admire the chic, decor of the living space and take in the peaceful surroundings from the lovely deck. This bright, stylish apartment is the perfect base to explore Cambridge and its surroundings. Located in a secure block, this contemporary living space has everything to make you feel at home – WiFi, washer and dryer, queen size beds, well equipped
neighborhood_overview:
Stroll the leafy streets and cobblestone sidewalks of Cambridge on any given day, and you’re immersed in a colorful, curious world with multiple languages being spoken. Step outside the commercial inner Square area, and you’ll find historic, architectural homes and plenty of green space, dotted with rabbits.

In a way, "Harvard Square is kind of like the Disney World of Cambridge." It’s bustling, and exciting. But always the neighborhood’s most iconic hotbed of activity, Cambridge has changed quite a bit, from dedicated bike lanes to fun and funky shops more afield of the square itself.
host_about: We live in Cambridge, MA with two small children and enjoy traveling to National Parks in the United States.

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is situated on Kendall Square at the intersection of Main Street and Broadway. The area hosts MIT and a variety of co-working spaces and incubators, ideal for bright young minds. It is home to a cutting-edge tech community and has thus become one of the world's most important tech and biotech centers. Farm-to-table restaurants and third-wave coffee joints have also found their places around this startup culture. The Cambridge neighborhood, which is a top destination for shopping, is centered around Kendall Square. The Kendall transit stop is only a 4-minute walk away via Main Street.

host_about:
We built Zeus Living so you can feel at home wherever opportunity takes you. Whether it’s for a month, a year, or sometime in between, you can count on a thoughtfully designed home and a comfortable, easy stay. Our technology helps us select homes you’ll love in ideal locations at a good value, while our expert team handles all the details. Based in San Francisco, and operating in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, New York City, Seattle, Boston, and Washington, D.C.


** 
PLEASE NOTE: Many of our homes are pet friendly, which you will see listed under "House Rules". If you do plan to bring your furry friend(s), we have a one-time non-refundable fee of $500 for the first pet and an additional $250 for the second. We have several dog breed restrictions. Most of our dog-friendly homes do not allow American Pit bulls, Rottweilers, Akitas, Cane Corsos, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Staffordshire Terriers, Dobermans, German Shepherds, Boxers, Malamutes, Huskies, Dalmatians, Chow Chows, Fila Brasileiros, or Wolf hybrids. We encourage individuals with service animals or one of the breeds listed as restricted to contact us before booking.

Zeus tenant screening involves ID verification, a soft credit check (will not impact your credit score), and a background check. We will decline residents who provide fraudulent identification, have a credit score below 650, and/or have a history of eviction. In accordance with local regulation, criminal history may be taken into consideration in approving or declining a reservation. For residents without US credit history, Zeus may ask for additional documentation to demonstrate proof of finance.

name: Upstairs in Central Square
description: Welcome to Upstairs in Central Square! This is two bedroom apartment in the heart of Cambridge.  With an extra fold out futon bed for extra guests.  Great light on this third floor walk up that's set back a block from Mass Ave, so its surprisingly quiet.  Located right in between MIT and Harvard, in the bustling and fun Central Square, the T is a mere 30 second walk away to whisk you away to all parts Boston in minutes!
host_about:
I spent most of my adult life traveling around the globe from my home base in Portland,Oregon... sometimes staying in people's house, sometimes just a hammock between two trees.  I am currently indoctrinating my son to like these things so we can hit the road when he gets a wee bit older.  My last trip was across India by bicycle.  Good fun if you get the chance!

Since I've been in Cambridge, I've learned things that would be not possible while traveling, learning the guitar, making beer, perfecting my jerk chicken burritos...and I've grown to love this town...lively music scene, and the biking is getting better and better!

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Central Square, Cambridge, which is centered on the junction of Massachusetts Avenue, Prospect Street and Western Avenue. The diverse area is well known for its wide variety of ethnic restaurants, bars, live music and theatre venues. Many startups have moved research and office operations into the Square to take advantage of the relatively low costs and the proximity to MIT. Nearly demolished in the 1950’s, the neighborhood was spared and went so far as to experience a sort of renaissance. In 2012, the state of Massachusetts designated Central Square as an official Cultural District.

name: The NERDpartment in the heart of Cambridge
description:
Our lovely apartment was former worker's housing built during the late 1880s for the labor force nearby the railway to Boston. Located in the heart of East Cambridge, we're 15 minutes walk from MIT/Kendall and Bunker Hill, and 25 minutes walk from Harvard.

With the disappearance of the railways and the rise of high-tech, most of our tenants, including yours truly, have been academics and students of the many universities nearby!

The space
Besides our proximity to Harvard and MIT, and our close proximity to food and culture (1 min to Thai, Chinese, Mexican, restaurants and a European bakery cafe anyone?), and our building being over 140 years old; we're uniquely trying to best offer a space for families visiting schools, academics and professionals a cozy and inviting space to stay during their visit of our city.

License number
C0222850491
neighborhood_overview:
We have a series of lovely Portugese, Brazilian and Italian restaurants near by Cambridge street. Elmendorf Bakery and cafe, is right around the corner, and 9Zaab Thai place is less than a minute walk!

Along with the popular Lone Star Taco Bar, easy going pizza place of Aram's #2, and cozy bar/restaurant of Portuglia.

Other than food, we are in a highly walkable family neighbourhood with plenty of parks and between two large local libraries. Very close to a nearby Starmarket, and a strip mall. There's also a laundromat less than 30 seconds walk from our door to make up for our lack of laundry options in unit.
host_about: Hello! I'm a explorer at heart and love to see the world, really looking forward to hearing about your experiences and perspectives!

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located at Harvard Square, a triangular plaza near the center of Cambridge, Massachusetts. 'The Square' (as it is sometimes referred to locally) is both a commercial and residential center. Bookstores, theatres and music venues line the streets and enhance the energetic atmosphere. The neighborhood's central location, close proximity to university campuses and many public transportation options make it a bustling hub for people of all ages. During the day, take a stroll and discover the area's tranquil scenery. At night, there are countless bar and entertainment options. On the T, Downtown is a 15 minute ride while Logan International Airport is 30 minutes away.

Your Zeus home is warm, c
host_about:
We built Zeus Living so you can feel at home wherever opportunity takes you. Whether it’s for a month, a year, or sometime in between, you can count on a thoughtfully designed home and a comfortable, easy stay. Our technology helps us select homes you’ll love in ideal locations at a good value, while our expert team handles all the details. Based in San Francisco, and operating in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, New York City, Seattle, Boston, and Washington, D.C.


** 
PLEASE NOTE: Many of our homes are pet friendly, which you will see listed under "House Rules". If you do plan to bring your furry friend(s), we have a one-time non-refundable fee of $500 for the first pet and an additional $250 for the second. We have several dog breed restrictions. Most of our dog-friendly homes do not allow American Pit bulls, Rottweilers, Akitas, Cane Corsos, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Staffordshire Terriers, Dobermans, German Shepherds, Boxers, Malamutes, Huskies, Dalmatians, Chow Chows, Fila Brasileiros, or Wolf hybrids. We encourage individuals with service animals or one of the breeds listed as restricted to contact us before booking.

Zeus tenant screening involves ID verification, a soft credit check (will not impact your credit score), and a background check. We will decline residents who provide fraudulent identification, have a credit score below 650, and/or have a history of eviction. In accordance with local regulation, criminal history may be taken into consideration in approving or declining a reservation. For residents without US credit history, Zeus may ask for additional documentation to demonstrate proof of finance.

description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this sophisticated Central Square furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and lovely living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Cambridge has to offer! (ID #BOS255)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your sophisticated living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Central Square apartment has to offer. neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Central Square, Cambridge, which is centered on the junction of Massachusetts Avenue, Prospect Street and Western Avenue. The diverse area is well known for its wide variety of ethnic restaurants, bars, live music and theatre venues. Many startups have moved research and office operations into the Square to take advantage of the relatively low costs and the proximity to MIT. Nearly demolished in the 1950’s, the neighborhood was spared and went so far as to experience a sort of renaissance. In 2012, the state of Massachusetts designated Central Square as an official Cultural District.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

This one bedroom apartment is located in an ideal location, on a beautiful, very quiet, tree-lined street, yet just a 5-minute walk to Harvard Yard, 7-minute walk to Central Square T. Absolutely ideal location close to Mass. Ave. and two blocks from a gorgeous, large public park and under half-mile to the Charles River. Also, just a 6-minute walk to Whole Foods! Steps to dozens of restaurants and shops. Newly relisting this wonderful space after living in it; it is fully setup for Airbnb again!

The bedroom is large and freshly painted, and the full bed is one-year old and very comfortable. Living room has tons of sun and a 46” premium flat screen tv. Fast wifi and cable provided. name: Stunning One Bed in Luxury Cambridge Building
description:
This apartment is professionally managed by Furnished Quarters, the largest independently owned and operated supplier of short-term furnished housing with over 24 years of experience in the industry. The Watermark is a sleek, contemporary apartment complex with brilliant architecture, luxury amenities and the richness of a vibrant neighborhood, in the Kendall Square section of Cambridge, MA, just across the Charles River and nearby Boston. Building amenities include concierge service, a fitness center, an outdoor terrace, a sky deck, a resident lounge, a grilling area, a Zen garden, private conference space, and more. The property is just steps from the MIT campus, nearby Harvard, as well as several great restaurants, coffee shops, retail establishments, and 2.5 acres of landscaped open space. Exploring the Cambridge and Boston is a breeze as the Kendall/MIT T station, providing access to the Red Line, is just a 3-minute walk from the property.

The space
Combine
neighborhood_overview: Cambridge, Massachusetts is a charming, diverse city adjacent to Boston with beautiful views of the Charles River. A college town home to Harvard University and MIT, Cambridge is on the cutting edge of education, research and development. Residents of Cambridge enjoy being in the Greater Boston area without the hustle and bustle of Boston proper, creating the perfect balance between urban living and a suburban feel. Students attending college and living in the area hail from all over the world, giving Cambridge a worldly, international flavor. Harvard Square boasts historic red brick walkways and tree-lined blocks full of restaurants, shops, museums, entertainment centers and bookstores. The nearby Central Square is teeming with eclectic restaurants, bars, live music venues and small theaters. . Cambridge is an easy commute from downtown Boston via the “T” and the bus. Kendall Square and Central Square are within walking distance of Boston, just over the Charles River.
host_about:
I work for Furnished Quarters, the largest provider of furnished apartments in the Northeast. My family started this business over 20 years ago and we welcome the opportunity to host you in our apartments. 

Guests can expect a comfortable, fully furnished and equipped private apartment, plenty of helpful neighborhood information and 24-hour access to our team. We consider ourselves first and foremost a hospitality company and we are here to provide a worry-free stay that enables you to enjoy the city and feel like a local from the moment you arrive.

name: Spacious apt, 1400 sq ft - 2BR/1BA in Inman Square
description:
Spacious, 2nd floor apartment, excellent natural light, with 3-4 bedrooms (2 furnished), 1 full bathroom, living room, eat-in kitchen, sun-room/porch, and shared backyard space. Laundry is available free of charge in basement. Kitchen is well-stocked. Wonderful location in heart of Inman Square (near plenty of restaurants and bars) and walking distance to Union, Kendall, and Central squares. Wifi included.
Water pressure in shower is weak, but otherwise, very comfortable, spacious apartment.
host_about:
I am an Internal Medicine physician who works in Boston. I enjoy reading, playing tennis, and spending time with friends to relax.
I look forward to meeting many of you AirBnB'ers on my travels, both for work and for pleasure.

We would love to host you in our spacious, lovely, and well-situated apartment. You cannot get better with this location - 5-15 mins walking (3-5 mins biking) from Boston, MGH, MIT, Harvard, Kendal, and more!

This unit is located in a small 2-unit building and is a few minutes from Charles River. This particular unit is spacious and includes 2 bedrooms, kitchen, back yard, living room with TV and cables, and a private bath with tub/shower. It is located right in East Cambridge a block away from life on Cambridge street.

Location: The apartment is located 10 mins walking distance or 3 mins bike ride from Kendall Square where you'll find shops, restaurants, MIT, Harvard, Bio/Pharma/Tech Corporations Such as Amgen, Biogen, Broad Institute, Genzyme, Google, Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Apple. If you need to commute, you're a few minutes away (walking distance) from the T Redline Kendal Square station and T Greenline Lechmere station.

name: Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment Near MIT/Harvard
description:
This apartment is professionally managed by Furnished Quarters, the largest independently owned and operated supplier of short-term furnished housing with over 24 years of experience in the industry. This sleek residence captures the energy of the city with modern architecture, the richness of a vibrant neighborhood, and luxury amenities. Indulge in an array of amenities such as concierge service, a game room, a conference room, a 24-hour fitness center with yoga room and children’s play area, a heated indoor swimming pool, a media room, a private courtyard with grilling areas, on-site Zipcar vehicles and more. The surrounding Kendall Square area is an eclectic, robust, tech-centered neighborhood near the Charles River, Harvard University and MIT. Easily travel the rest of the city and metro area by walking to one of four T stations serving the Green, Red, Orange and Blue lines, in addition to two bus stations and the Boston North Amtrak Station.

The space
Design
neighborhood_overview: Cambridge, Massachusetts is a charming, diverse city adjacent to Boston with beautiful views of the Charles River. A college town home to Harvard University and MIT, Cambridge is on the cutting edge of education, research and development. Residents of Cambridge enjoy being in the Greater Boston area without the hustle and bustle of Boston proper, creating the perfect balance between urban living and a suburban feel. Students attending college and living in the area hail from all over the world, giving Cambridge a worldly, international flavor. Harvard Square boasts historic red brick walkways and tree-lined blocks full of restaurants, shops, museums, entertainment centers and bookstores. The nearby Central Square is teeming with eclectic restaurants, bars, live music venues and small theaters. . Cambridge is an easy commute from downtown Boston via the “T” and the bus. Kendall Square and Central Square are within walking distance of Boston, just over the Charles River.
host_about:
I work for Furnished Quarters, the largest provider of furnished apartments in the Northeast. My family started this business over 20 years ago and we welcome the opportunity to host you in our apartments. 

Guests can expect a comfortable, fully furnished and equipped private apartment, plenty of helpful neighborhood information and 24-hour access to our team. We consider ourselves first and foremost a hospitality company and we are here to provide a worry-free stay that enables you to enjoy the city and feel like a local from the moment you arrive.

name: Central Sq Studio w/ Doorman, nr T Stop
description:
Discover the best of Cambridge, with this studio Central Square apartment with views over the city. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, charming living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #BOS311)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your sophisticated living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Central Square apartment has to offer.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio include an on-site:

- Doorman
- Dryer in building
- Elevator
- Gym
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Central Square, Cambridge, which is centered on the junction of Massachusetts Avenue, Prospect Street and Western Avenue. The diverse area is well known for its wide variety of ethnic restaurants, bars, live music and theatre venues. Many startups have moved research and office operations into the Square to take advantage of the relatively low costs and the proximity to MIT. Nearly demolished in the 1950’s, the neighborhood was spared and went so far as to experience a sort of renaissance. In 2012, the state of Massachusetts designated Central Square as an official Cultural District.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Central Square, Cambridge, which is centered on the junction of Massachusetts Avenue, Prospect Street and Western Avenue. The diverse area is well known for its wide variety of ethnic restaurants, bars, live music and theatre venues. Many startups have moved research and office operations into the Square to take advantage of the relatively low costs and the proximity to MIT. Nearly demolished in the 1950’s, the neighborhood was spared and went so far as to experience a sort of renaissance. In 2012, the state of Massachusetts designated Central Square as an official Cultural District.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. name: (35) Private apt with newly renovated kitchen
description:
This spacious garden level 1 bedroom 1 bath guest suite is all yours to enjoy and call home for your visit. Private entrance through a tranquil garden area. The suite is nestled behind an old mansion and surrounded by greens. It is 5 minute walk to Wholefoods and 7 minute walk to Central T. It is right at the heart of Harvard and MIT, both within short distance. Charles River is only short run away.

The space
Please NOTE: this is a basement level apartment, the ceiling height is ~7 feet. For guests over 7 ft, we would discourage you from reserving this unit.

No-shoes Policy: We strive to keep a very clean staying experience for our guests and therefore we kindly ask that you remove your shoes inside the apt. We have special Oriental rugs which makes it impossible to clean if walked-on especially after rain or snow days. Thank you for your understanding!

This one-bedroom apartment is located at the heart of Cambridge in Central Square. Just
neighborhood_overview: Central Square is truly the center of everything that's happening in Cambridge. Located right in between Harvard Square and Kendall Square (MIT), it's walking distance to both institutions and all the research centers in the area. I used to bike from Harvard to MIT when I was a student, a very pleasant 15 minute ride. Harvard Street is just two streets north of Massachusetts Avenue, which is the main street that connects these school and also directly leads to downtown. A simple Google search shows that there're more than twenty 4-Star+ coffee shops and countless 4-Star+ restaurants, you can walk to restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, universities, just about everywhere.
host_about:
A world traveler trapped inside a body of an entrepreneur who wants to make the world a better place to live. This career path gave me the freedom to control my time and hence I was able to travel internationally at least a few times a year, I've been to over 15 countries across four continents, the pace's just too slow. I love staying at Airbnb to get local tips, make new friends, and as a way for me to enrich my global experience without physically traveling there, I want to become a host as well. Boston is a tourist destination for many reasons, and in Cambridge, I meet many intelligent, fun, and creative people all around the world. I hope to be a host and local guide for those who visiting Cambridge and Boston. 

My No.1 recommendation of a Must-watch movie: "Good Will Hunting". If you are coming to Boston/Cambridge, please do watch that movie, it will add some color to your Boston experience.

name: 1 Bedroom near MIT, Panoramic Cambridge Views
description:
This apartment is professionally managed by Furnished Quarters, the largest independently owned and operated supplier of short-term furnished housing with over 24 years of experience in the industry. The luxury high-rise building is found in the University Park neighborhood of Cambridge, within walking distance of the MIT and Harvard campuses. The pet-friendly building boasts amenities such as a 24-hour front desk, beautifully landscaped grounds, a catering kitchen and entertainment dining room, a community garden, a conference room, a resident lounge, a fitness center and yoga studio, a grilling area and an outdoor terrace/deck. Get to Harvard University or Boston with ease by walking 10-20 minutes to the Red Line at either the Central or Kendall/MIT T station.

The space
This regally designed one-bedroom apartment adjacent to MIT features large windows with panoramic Cambridge views, a spacious bedroom closet, an eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, an in-un
neighborhood_overview: Cambridge, Massachusetts is a charming, diverse city adjacent to Boston with beautiful views of the Charles River. A college town home to Harvard University and MIT, Cambridge is on the cutting edge of education, research and development. Residents of Cambridge enjoy being in the Greater Boston area without the hustle and bustle of Boston proper, creating the perfect balance between urban living and a suburban feel. Students attending college and living in the area hail from all over the world, giving Cambridge a worldly, international flavor. Harvard Square boasts historic red brick walkways and tree-lined blocks full of restaurants, shops, museums, entertainment centers and bookstores. The nearby Central Square is teeming with eclectic restaurants, bars, live music venues and small theaters. . Cambridge is an easy commute from downtown Boston via the “T” and the bus. Kendall Square and Central Square are within walking distance of Boston, just over the Charles River.
host_about:
I work for Furnished Quarters, the largest provider of furnished apartments in the Northeast. My family started this business over 20 years ago and we welcome the opportunity to host you in our apartments. 

Guests can expect a comfortable, fully furnished and equipped private apartment, plenty of helpful neighborhood information and 24-hour access to our team. We consider ourselves first and foremost a hospitality company and we are here to provide a worry-free stay that enables you to enjoy the city and feel like a local from the moment you arrive.

name: Cambridge 1BR w/ W/D, Elevator, nr Shops & Dining
description:
Show up and start living from day one in Cambridge with this spacious one-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Alewife home with stunning views over the city. (ID #BOS318)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your beautiful living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Alewife apartment has to offer. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom include an on-site:

- BBQ Area
- Dryer
- Elevator
- Washing machine
neighborhood_overview: This turnkey furnished apartment is located in Alewife, a fast-growing Cambridge neighborhood. There are plenty of cafes, restaurants and shops clustered around Alewife's T station. Anyone who likes to cook for themselves will be pleased by the selection at Ferro's Foodtown, a popular grocery store. Nature lovers can hike, bike, and birdwatch in the Alewife Brook Reservation. Alewife is served by several MBTA bus lines as well as the Red Line.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Porter Square, Cambridge near the intersection of Somerville and Massachusetts Avenue. The area is always buzzing with activity and offers a wide range of goods and services such as coffee shops, supermarkets and gyms. There are more unique options as well though like a Japantown mall and a live music venue. Widely known for having a diverse restaurant scene, people flock from all over to have a meal here. Full of students and young professionals, Porter Square is easily reached via the MBTA Red Line and the Commuter Rail. Originally named for Porter’s Hotel which use to be the center of the square, Porter Square has evolved into an area offering something for everyone.

name: Central Sq 1BR w/ W/D, Doorman, nr T
description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this cozy Central Square furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and exquisite living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Cambridge has to offer! (ID #BOS328)

The space
Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this one-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in Cambridge, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom include an on-site:

- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevator
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Central Square, Cambridge, which is centered on the junction of Massachusetts Avenue, Prospect Street and Western Avenue. The diverse area is well known for its wide variety of ethnic restaurants, bars, live music and theatre venues. Many startups have moved research and office operations into the Square to take advantage of the relatively low costs and the proximity to MIT. Nearly demolished in the 1950’s, the neighborhood was spared and went so far as to experience a sort of renaissance. In 2012, the state of Massachusetts designated Central Square as an official Cultural District.

name: (34) Entire private studio unit in Harvard/MIT
description:
Come enjoy this newly renovated studio suite in between Harvard Square and Central Square! A 7 minute walk to the Central Square T, 5 min walk to Whole Foods, and 10 min walk to Harvard Campus. Features a fully equipped kitchen and private entrance. Beautiful tiled bathroom makes you feel clean just walking in. This is a great space for some personal place to study, visit Harvard/MIT, explore Boston, or just enjoy what New England has to offer.

The space
Please NOTE: this is a basement level studio apartment, the ceiling height is ~7 feet. For guests over 7 ft, we would discourage you from reserving this unit.

No-shoes Policy: We strive to keep a very clean staying experience for our guests and therefore we kindly ask that you remove your shoes inside the apt. We have special Oriental rugs which makes it impossible to clean if walked-on especially after rain or snow days. Thank you for your understanding!

This studio apartment is located at
neighborhood_overview: Central Square is truly the center of everything that's happening in Cambridge. Located right in between Harvard Square and Kendall Square (MIT), it's walking distance to both institutions and all the research centers in the area. I used to bike from Harvard to MIT when I was a student, a very pleasant 15 minute ride. Harvard Street is just two streets north of Massachusetts Avenue, which is the main street that connects these school and also directly leads to downtown. A simple search shows that there're more than twenty 4-Star+ coffee shops and countless 4-Star+ restaurants, you can walk to restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, universities, just about everywhere.
host_about:
A world traveler trapped inside a body of an entrepreneur who wants to make the world a better place to live. This career path gave me the freedom to control my time and hence I was able to travel internationally at least a few times a year, I've been to over 15 countries across four continents, the pace's just too slow. I love staying at Airbnb to get local tips, make new friends, and as a way for me to enrich my global experience without physically traveling there, I want to become a host as well. Boston is a tourist destination for many reasons, and in Cambridge, I meet many intelligent, fun, and creative people all around the world. I hope to be a host and local guide for those who visiting Cambridge and Boston. 

My No.1 recommendation of a Must-watch movie: "Good Will Hunting". If you are coming to Boston/Cambridge, please do watch that movie, it will add some color to your Boston experience.

name: Central Square - Between Harvard & MIT
description:
On a quiet residential street, two blocks away from Central Square and the MBTA (subway and busses).

Apt is close to Harvard, MIT, public transportation, bars, restaurants, coffeehouses, grocery stores.

Apt is far enough back from Mass Ave that it feels like a neighborhood, but close enough that you're minutes away from the action.

A good place for students, solo adventurers and business travelers.

The space
Room:
- This private bedroom is on the 2nd floor (other 2 bedrooms on 3rd floor).
- 2 windows, 1 closet, hardwood floor.
- Lots of natural light.
- Queen sized bed (with bed-frame), wardrobe, 2 desks, desk lamp, chairs, side table, floor lamps, blackout curtains.
- Area: 156 ft² (12 x 13 foot).

Apt:
- This is a duplex style house, we have the 2nd and 3rd floor.
- Shared living room, kitchen, bathroom.
- Skylights in the kitchen and bathroom provide great natural light.
-
neighborhood_overview:
3 minute walk to bars, restaurants, coffeehouses, grocery stores (Target, H-Mart), fitness centers (BSC, VIM Fitness), Cambridge Public Library.

Also walking distance to Boston's Back Bay, Harvard Square, MIT, the Charles River (biking, jogging, walking trails), Trader Joe’s, Micro Center, Whole Foods, Inman Square.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Restaurant recommendations:
- Miracle of Science Bar & Grill (beers on tap & a food menu designed like a periodic table)
- Asgard Irish Pub & Restaurant (karaoke & trivia nights)
- Little Donkey (global tapas)
- Thelonious Monkfish
- Craigie On Main

Coffeehouses:

...and many more.
